title: Between the Scenes - Trevor's Confusing Birthday Song Experience
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trevor's Confusing Birthday Song Experience
description:
Trevor describes how his mom taught him a high energy, upbeat birthday song from Disney instead of the more somber and traditional "Happy Birthday to You."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
